name: Reunited: No More ICE
description:
Children have been separated from their parents at the United States’ border because reasons. You are a case worker, and it is your goal to reunite the parents with their children. However, their parents are being deported soon. If the parents are deported, the children will be forever lost from their parents. You are against the clock to save these families.

 

Parents describe their child to you – their hair color, eye color, shirt color, and favorite toy. Press “O” to spawn moveable toys near the children. Once you identify the right child for the parent, click on the child and then click on “match” to reunite the family and move on to the next parent. You can switch between parents by clicking “SWITCH.”
